1.content:
You walk out of the hot sun-baked parking lot and into the cool movie theater. It didn't look that big on the outside, but the inside is huge. You walk over to the center of the room where the counter is. You buy your ticket to the movie you want to see(Strangely, this theater is playing several old classic movies along with the new ones. They are even showing some XXX movies! A special promotion perhaps?) along with all the snacks 10 bucks will buy(Not alot with your bucket of popcorn that cost you $5). You thank the lady at the counter and walk down the dimly lit hallway that leads to your movie. You walk into theater 3 and walk down the rows of seats looking for a good place to sit. You see an empty chair up front and quickly sit down in it. "This must be my lucky day." You say as you watch the screen light up as the previews start to play. You munch on your popcorn as you gaze excitedly at the screen. Suddenly it shines bright enough to light up the whole room. People gasp in shock and shield their eyes as the brightness envelops the walls and ceiling. You get up from your seat and stare in shock at whats happing around you. You are so amazed that you don't even realise the light is pulling you towards the movie screen. The last thing that passed through your mind before you are pulled into the movie is:"How can this be happening again?"

Let's start with the rating of your desired movie this time, shall we?
1.title: A day at the movies

11.content: A kid at heart huh? Enjoy these great movies fit for the whole family.
11.title: Kid-approved!

choices: The part at the beginning where they sneak out to go to the opening of Retroland
The part where find out their parents are missing and party
The part where they blast off in their amusement park ride spaceships
112.title: Gotta blast!

choices: I'm not an animal, I'm still a human
114.content: You can see again. The blinding flash that eclipsed the movie theater is gone...and it its place is an animated version of hollywood. Oh, and a lot of the people here are talking animals. What kind of animal are you?
114.title: The title of this movie is very misleading...

1143.content: If you are not a cat then perhaps you are a dog raccoon or some other kind of animal?
1143.title: Other

1153.content: How about meeting The Great Bear, the brown bear with a forest of trees growing out of it's back?
1153.title: More plz

choices: On top of the giant bear
11531.content: OK, so where do you find yourself starting out?
11531.title: Sure, I'd like that

12.content: A good solid collection of movies most people will love.
12.title: A bit of adult content

121.content: The first thing that you see after being pulled into the movie screen is a lush CGI world that appears to be set in some sort of fairy tale. You take a look around, you seem to be...
121.title: Shrek

choices: Walk over to them and say hello
Ignore them and pull the lever like you were going to do
1211.content: You appear to be standing in the middle of a city. As you look around you notice the many shops, the towering city walls, and a strange booth that says "Welcome to Duloc!" You are about to walk over to the booth and pull the lever on its side when you see a strange green man and his donkey walking up to the entrance of the city. They haven't seen you...
1211.title: Welcome to Duloc

choices: "I'm a spellcaster! I just teleported here..."
"I'm... a thief! I snuck in here..."
12111.content: You wait for them to notice you and then walk over to them. "Hello there, can you tell me where everyone in this place went?" You ask as the green man, which you now clearly see is an ogre, rolls his eyes. "I was hoping you could tell me that, arn't you from here?" He replies in a suspicious tone. "Oh... uh, no. I'm... a traveler, I just got here myself." You lie as you back away a bit. "Hey, wait a minute!" The donkey blurts out. "If you just got here, then how come we didn't see you come in before us?" You take a few moments to answer this time, after all its not every day a talking donkey asks you a question. "Oh, uh..."
12111.title: Excuses...

choices: Ask if you can join them
121111.content: "I'm a powerful spellcaster! I just teleported here from... Far Far Away!" You stammer, hoping that the duo believe the lie. The donkey and ogre exchange confused looks before turning back to you. "Well then... why didn't ya just say so?!" The donkey shouts excitedly. "Say, can you do any card tricks?!" You back away a little more and remain silent. "Okay then, whoever you are, it was nice meeting you, but we're here on business. So if you'll just excuse us..." The ogre calls out as he shoves the donkey along. "Yeah... okay then, nice meeting you." You call back. "Hey, hold on a second Shrek! Maybe they're here for something too, let's bring them with us!" The ogre lets out a groan and shakes his head. "C'mon donkey..." You begin following them and...
121111.title: Business trip

choices: Cloudy with a chance of meatballs
125.title: More

12513.content: You found yourself in the Detroit City Police Department. You slip out the back door. You then find yourself in
12513.title: the police station

125132.content: You decide to have a look around. You had hardly walked 10 paces when a noise behind you made you stop. You turned to see
125132.title: the weapons storage area

1251322.content: "Hi' the girl says kindly "Whats your name?". You introduce yourself. Suddenly, a noise nearby makes you both jump. You turn to see
1251322.title: a young girl

choices: I don't want a limb soaked off
12533.content: What about those acid bleeding creatrues?
12533.title: More

125331.content: OK, but where does the fight begin?
125331.title: AVP Requium

choices: NO SEW BUTTONS ON EYES AAAAAAAHHHH!!!!!
125332.content: You... arn't afraid of buttons... are you?
125332.title: BUTTONS!!!!!

13.content: These movies are mostly for teens and adults.
13.title: The bane of everyone 12 and under

choices: Someone who was in the theater with you
131.content: Once inside the movie you find yourself standing just outside a small town. You take a look around, all you see is desurt for miles around (along with some mountains). You decide to see if there is anyone in town that can help you. As you walk into town you see a sign that says the towns name is Perfection. "Hmmm...maybe this place won't be so bad." You say. Suddenly you see someone come out of a house and start to walk towards you, maybe they can help you, but who is it?
131.title: Watch out for graboids

132.content: So who's role are you playing?
132.title: Egale eye

choices: Dozens of FBI agents burst in
1321.content: You suddenly found yourself in a small room. You recognized it as Jerry Shaw's apartment. It was filled with canisters of chemicals, packs full of weapons and ammunition, various files, etc. You were examining everything when,
1321.title: Jerry Shaw

134.content: You have once again been pulled into a movie, but which movie is this? You seem to be in front of a strange building in a city, behind you is a car. "I guess I'm supposed to go into that building." You say as you walk towards the building, accidently getting half of your leg wet in a large water puddle along the way. "Ah, damn it." You say as you walk inside. The interrior of this building is completely white and seems to be empty. You see stairs and and elevator on the other side of the room. Which do you use?
134.title: Strange building

choices: To give you and the other guy the powers of god
To give just you the powers of god
To give just the other guy the powers of god
1341.content: You walk up the stairs wondering how this day could get any stranger. Once you get to the top you look over and see 2 figures standing in the middle of the room. The first one looks like an ordinary guy, but the other is wearing a white suit and is much older. The man in the suit notices you and says "Ah, right on time." You give him a confused look. "I'm on time...for what...?" The man smiles and asks you to come over and join the two of them. You walk over next to the oridinary looking guy as the man in the suit sits behind a desk. You and the normal guy exchange confused looks with each other, and you decide to ask him what you two are doing here. The man replies that he is god and is going...
1341.title: Right on time

13411.content: "Both of you seem promising, and I could use a vacation, so I'm going to give you both all of my powers. All of the powers of god, to do with as you wish." You and the other guy both give him a look like he'd just cut off his own nose and ate it. "Now if you'll excuse me I'll be off, good luck to the both of you." Just as you were both about to ask what the hell was going on the man suddenly disappeared. "Holy hell!" Yelled the man next to you. "What just happened...?" "I don't have a clue..." You say. "Do you think what he said was true?" The man looks and you with a freaked out look on his face. "I-I don't know...but...I don't have time for this." He starts to walk away really fast torwards the stairs. You decide to...
13411.title: The powers of god

choices: Use your newfound powers for personal gain
Use your newfound powers in a less selfish way
134112.content: You decide its best to just let him leave. You are now completely alone. "Hmmm...if what he said was true I should be able to do anything..." You say to yourself as you look around. For some reason you feel compeled to jump out of the nearby window. "I should be able to fly!" You shout as you run over to the window. You jump with enough force to shatter the glass and propel yourself into the air. You keep you eyes closed as you expect to fall...but you don't! After a few seconds you open your eyes and see that you are hovering just outside the window. You can't beleave it. What now?
134112.title: Omnipotent

How about, lord of the Rings series (movies, prequels and games)?
no ones done it yet

1453.content: Do you like scary movies?
1453.title: Really scary

choices: You help her take out the bad guys
You stand by and watch as she makes quick work of them all
1453321.content: Just when you think things couldn't get any more awesome... they do. Laying on the floor next to you is Kickass, but that isn't was has your attention at the moment. Standing in front of you is Hit Girl... who has just stabbed some dude through the back with a machete. Several thugs soon try to attack her in revenge for killing their leader, completely ignoring you and Kickass. What's your response?
1453321.title: Prelude to an asskicking

choices: Get yourself a costume and join them!
Decline... and join Red Mist and his father instead!
14533212.content: You decide to just stay out of Hit Girl's way as she kills all of the thugs effortlessly. Finally, the guard outside notices what is going on and tries to sneak up on Hit Girl, but he is shot before he can get to her. As it turns out Big Daddy (Her dad obviously.) took him down with a sniper rifle. You and Kickass are both stupefied. "WOW!" You think to yourself. This movie was awesome to watch, but being in it is even cooler. Big Daddy joins Hit Girl and they leave, but not before offering the both of you a chance to join them. What do you do?
14533212.title: Taking sides

1453322.content: Ok how about the "Alien". you know the facehuggers, chestbuster, ect. You wunt to do the first "Alien" moive?
1453322.title: Nah

14533222.content: Ok how about "Aliens" it's the 2nd movie of the "Alien" moives
14533222.title: next

145332222.content: "Alien 3"? the 3rd movie in the "Alien" movies
145332222.title: still more

14533222222.title: You can't cheat Death

145332222221.content: OK, so your in the fourth Final Destination film, which may be the most horrifying of all of them. So where will we start
145332222221.title: I'm ready for this.

choices: Lets party till the break of dawn!
145332222222.title: I'd rather try something else.

choices: Your government thanks you for your participation.
14533222222222.title: Keep going

choices: I am not programmed to commit to this choice

145332222222222.title: T-3

1453322222222222.title: I am not programmed to commit to this choice

154.title: Warning: May contain tentacules

1543.title: I wonder if this is even legal...?

info.description:
It has been a few months since one of your friends lent you a strange magical DVD that pulled you inside it when you tried to watch it. After that incident you've been a little bit nervous whenever you put in a movie, so you decide to go to a theater for a change. This is not a normal theater however, and you just might be going on another wild adventure.

Rules

1. If you exit the movie the story ends unless you enter another movie.
2. If you would die you are instead ejected from the movie.
3. I'll add a lot of chapters myself, but if you come to the end of a storyline please add your own chapter even if its only a few sentances long. Its no fun if I decide everything that happens.
4. Keep all chapters as gender-neutral as possible, I want anyone and everyone to feel like this could really be them exploring these worlds.
5. You're in a theater, so if you want you can have other people join you in the movie.


Note: I'm sorry this was so late in getting put up, my computer had been giving me some serious problems. Everything should be fine now though.


Below is a list of movies that have already been used, so don't add them (This list is currently incomplete).
